gr.agroscape.authorities

Class LandPropertyRegistry

  • java.lang.Object
    • gr.agroscape.authorities.LandPropertyRegistry

  • public class LandPropertyRegistry
extends java.lang.Object
    The Land Property Registry of the simulation
    The concern of this class is
    • to keep information regarding which Agent owns which Plot
    • which Farmer cultivates which Plot
    • To give information on a Farmer for the Plot he cultivates
    Author:
    jkr

      • getCultivatingPlots

        public java.util.ArrayList<Plot> getCultivatingPlots(Farmer f)
        Returns the Plots that are available for a farmer to cultivate.
        Those plots are composed of: (i) those that are rented by the farmer (ii) Those that are owned by the farmer and are not rented to third agents
        Parameters:
        f - Farmer
        Returns:
        ArrayList(Plot)

      • getOwner

        public Agent getOwner(Plot p)
               throws java.lang.NullPointerException
